propositions.text: Seats Mu's personal background and struggles as an orphan
Seats Mu grew up in an orphanage with no memory of parents
Seats Mu's continuous search for parental roots
Feelings of unfairness and lack of parental warmth
Seats Mu's determination and hard work to change destiny
Excelling academically and entering a prestigious university
Supporting life through scholarships and part-time jobs
Career progression from counselor to mid-level manager
Emotional conflict and loneliness despite achievements
Momentary joy of promotion followed by emptiness
Feelings of isolation amidst colleagues' mixed reactions
Connection with the orphanage and ongoing involvement
Request to return to the orphanage for a公益活动
Complex emotions tied to the orphanage
Reflections on wealth, status, and personal aspirations
Dream of driving a BMW and questioning future success
Professional engagements and recognition
Involvement in a multi-billion investment project discussion
Recognition by orphanage and corporate entities
Social alienation at public events
Feeling unnoticed and powerless in a crowd
Questioning the relevance of social hierarchies

hierarchy.structure: The document follows a narrative structure, detailing Seats Mu's life journey from orphanhood to career success, intertwined with emotional struggles and ongoing ties to the orphanage, culminating in reflections on social alienation.
